projects.title: Image Captioning
projects.description: Generating a caption for the given image using CNN and RNN. The model has been trained on the Flickr8K Dataset.
projects.details:
Programming Language - Python
Libraries used - Tensorflow, Keras, Pandas, Numpy, Flask Web Framework

projects.title: Examination Management System
projects.description: A portal to create exam notifications, collecting fees from the students and generating hall tickets for the students who paid.
projects.details:
Scripting Language - PHP
Web Framework - CodeIgniter (MVC Architecture)
Libraries used - DOMPDF, CrudIgniter

projects.title: Anurag's Skill Club
projects.description: An android app for our college's Skills Club. Admin login has provided with many features including sending notifications to students.
projects.details:
Programming Language - Java
IDE used - Android Studio

Scritping Language - PHP
CSS Framework - Bootstrap

projects.title: Anurag’s Student Course Registration
projects.description: Center for Development of Technical Competencies (CDTC) is a student enrollment site into various clubs and courses offered by Anurag Group of Institutions.

Programming Language - PHP
